summary: A letter from Warden Lamine N Diaye of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York to Judge Richard M. Berman, confirming that the FBI and OIG investigations into Jeffrey Epstein's death will include the July 23, 2019 incident at the MCC. The warden states an internal investigation was completed but details cannot be divulged.

keyFacts: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on or about July 23, 2019.
An internal Bureau of Prisons investigation into the July 23 incident had been completed prior to August 12, 2019.
The FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) were conducting ongoing investigations that would include the July 23 incident.
Warden Lamine N Diaye declined to divulge any information about the prior internal investigation at that time.
The correspondence shows judicial oversight by Judge Richard M. Berman into the conditions and incidents concerning defendant Epstein while in custody.
